name: Testing the 'find_missing_number' function
description:
Testing 'find_missing_number' function with various test data [with numbers=[1, 2, 3], expected=4].

        Test a function that should take a shuffled list of
        unique numbers from 1 to n with one element missing
        (which can be any number including n). Should return
        this missing number.
        :return:

Test a function that should take a shuffled list of unique numbers from 1 to n with one element missing (which can be any number including n). The function should return the missing number.
